name: The Man Whose Eyes Did Not Burn!
name_original: The Man Whose Eyes Did Not Burn!
description:
The Man Whose Eyes Did Not Burn!

The cloud of radioactive gas left behind by the meteor that fell to Earth caused all onions to mutate. The onions got bigger, started acting aggressively and constantly burned everyone's eyes. Onions continued to dominate the world...

But the only man () whose eyes did not burn now took his knife!

Note: Music and fonts in the game are assets (links bellow).

Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/8bit-music-album-051321-196147 (Date of access: 21.02.2022)

Font: https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/list/foundry/design-sayshu (Date of access: 21.02.2022)
